page.title: 06Policing in Irvine.
page.content: We spoke to two{policemen}about any changes in crime which had occurred. We asked them if there was more crime in the eighties than the seventies and they both said that there was.We asked if it was because there were more people or because more people were turning to crime and they said that both reasons were responsible.After that we asked them if criminals were younger or older than they used to be. Again they agreed that they were younger.Our next question was whether any new crimes had appeared. They both said that{drug crimes}were new and one said there was a high rise in{glue {sniffing.}We asked them what was the most common crime in this area.The answer was{theft.}Our last question was whether they thought offenders are properly punished.They both said firmly{"No."
